name: World Geography
storyline:
How good are you at geography? Do you know the capitals of all European countries? Can you name all the countries in South America or all the states in the USA? Are you able to identify all Asian countries on the map? And how about Australia and Oceania? Can you distinguish the flag of Monaco from the flag of Indonesia? Do you know the most populous country in Africa? What country is larger, Mexico or Argentina?
You can find answers to these questions and check your knowledge with World Geography - Quiz Game. World Geography is a quiz game that will help you to learn everything about the countries, their capitals, flags, and a lot of other interesting information. Improve your knowledge by competing with players from all over the world and become an expert in geography.
summary: Become an expert in geography with World Geography - Quiz Game. World Geography is a quiz game that will help you to learn everything about countries - maps, flags, emblems, capitals, population, religion, languages, currencies, and much more. This game will help you learn all about geography in an easy and enjoyable way.
